title: Racist WhatsApp 'mistake' returns to haunt woman
text:
Print 
Anilia Van Niekerk Graaf told TMG Digital that she deeply regrets what she did and said she was being tormented and harassed. 
“That place is a dump. One bedroom at the back in the k***er’s erf‚” she wrote in the message‚ intended for a friend. My cousin just sent me this. This white lady viewed her friend's cottage and sent him this by mistake. I'm so tired of white people wow pic.twitter.com/FXCmNKRtyS — Sunshine J (@SunshineJones_) February 7, 2017 
The message was shared‚ generating a swift backlash on social media. Her phone began ringing off the hook. 
“Immediately after I sent the message‚ people started to harass me and it has been non-stop ever since. I was threatened that I would lose my job‚” she said. 
“I apologised to the person I accidently sent the message to and I apologised to some of the people who harassed me.”
